thread.section_title: BlueSun Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BlueSun Vacations | bluesunvacations.com | 5 of 65
thread.title: Heidi

author: Heidi
title: Heidi
text: After hours of frustrating attempts to book my Cancun vacation through Cheaptickets and Travelocity with no help from their customer service agents over the phone I decided to search one more time for a different option to book my vacation. That's when I came across Dana with Blue Sun Vacations! She was wonderful and friendly and made my booking experience so easy. I would highly recommend Blue Sun Vacations and if you get a chance book through Dana! She saved the day!
